attributes.action: encourage the free-flow on our overcrowded and over-signalled roads by adopting Left-Turn on Red (LToR) as the default standard at Signalled intersections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The LTOR scheme is implemented at selected junctions. 
It allows motorists on a minor road to turn left onto the main road during a red signal when it is safe to do so.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
